mapper.sql: select id id, dept_id deptId, role_id roleId, start_time startTime, end_time endTime, is_deleted isDeleted, gmt_create gmtCreate, gmt_modified gmtModified, user_id_create userIdCreate, user_id_modified userIdModified from dept_role
mapper.update: update dept_role set is_deleted=1,gmt_modified=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id=#{id}
